channel.title: Fixing runserver.bat files
channel.description:
I just downloaded Tyden 562/668 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,552957.0.html) and i fixed the compiler and then i went onto trying to run the server (runserver.bat) and it is automatically set to jre6 and this is the error it gets [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: trent/titanpk/Main Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: trent.titanpk.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: trent.titanpk.Main. Program will exit. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Then i switch it to jre7 and i get this [code]Error: Could not find or load main class trent.titanpk.Main Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I was wondering if you could either download the source+client, fix it and send it to me, OR add me on skype (leon.massimo) and teach me how to fix it myself (teaching me would be much more appreciated) or if one of you has experience with this server and it was terrible and have a better source for me, please send me a message with the link in it :)
Thank you ~Hinaruti

item.title: Fixing runserver.bat files
item.dc:creator: @gohstizsik gohstizsik
item.description:
@gohstizsik wrote:

I just downloaded Tyden 562/668 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,552957.0.html) and i fixed the compiler and then i went onto trying to run the server (runserver.bat) and it is automatically set to jre6 and this is the error it gets Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: trent/titanpk/Main Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: trent.titanpk.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: trent.titanpk.Main. Program will exit. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

Then i switch it to jre7 and i get this

Error: Could not find or load main class trent.titanpk.Main Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server Press any key to continue . . .

I was wondering if you could either download the source+client, fix it and send it to me, OR add me on skype (leon.massimo) and teach me how to fix it myself (teaching me would be much more appreciated) or if one of you has experience with this server and it was terrible and have a better source for me, please send me a message with the link in it

Thank you
~Hinaruti
